channel.title: XML Historical Foreign Exchange Rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) (26 Nov 2018)
channel.description: XML historical foreign exchange rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) from the Float Rates. Published at 26 Nov 2018.
